parse.title: Visa requirements for United States citizens

text.*:
Visa requirements[edit]

General visa requirements of fully internationally recognized countries towards United States citizens:

Country Visa requirement Allowed stay Notes
 Afghanistan Visa required[1]
  • Visitors born in Afghanistan do not require a visa.
  • Visitors arriving via military air need to legalize their stay if they wish to leave via commercial airline.
  • All visitors are fingerprinted.[2]
 Albania Visa not required[3][4] 1 year[5]
  • US citizens may stay for up to one year without a residence permit.[6]
 Algeria Visa required[7][8]
 Andorra Visa not required[9] 3 months[10][11]
 Angola Visa required[12]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required[13]
 Antigua and Barbuda Visa not required[14][15] 1 month
  • Stringent application of rules regarding proof of sufficient funds, return ticket and accommodation.
  • Departure tax (~US $27) applies.[16]
  • May enter using expired passports.[17]
 Argentina Online reciprocity fee[18][19] 90 days
  • Reciprocity fee of US$160 must be paid online in advance (valid for 10 years)[20][21]
  • Visitors are fingerprinted and photographed upon entry.
 Armenia Visa not required[22] 180 days
 Australia and territories Electronic Travel Authority[23] 90 days on each visit in 12-month period if granted[24]
 Austria Visa not required[25][26] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[27]
 Azerbaijan Visa required[28]
  • Registration upon arrival mandatory.
  • Applicants of Armenian ancestry or with Armenian visas in their passport may not obtain a visa.[29]
  • Can obtain a 30 days visa on arrival only if arriving on a direct flight of Azerbaijan Airlines from New York.[30]
 Bahamas Visa not required[31][32] 8 months
 Bahrain Visa on arrival[33] 14 days[34]
  • Visa also obtainable online[35]
 Bangladesh Visa on arrival[36] 30 days
  • Available at Shahjalal International Airport, Shah Amanat International Airport and Osmani International Airport.
  • Rules are not publicized.
  • Visa is not required by Bangladeshi Americans.
  • Departure tax applies.[37]
 Barbados Visa not required[38][39] 28 days, extendable up to 6 months[40]
 Belarus Visa required[41]
  • Visas are issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport
    if the support documents were submitted not later than 3 business days before expected date of arrival.[42]
  • Registration upon arrival for stays longer than 7 days is mandatory.
  • Visa-free visits to Belovezhskaya Pushcha National Park for up to 3 days.[43]
  • No transit without a visa under any circumstance.[44]
 Belgium Visa not required[45] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[46]
 Belize Visa not required[47][48] 1 month, extendable up to 6 months[49]
  • Departure tax (~$40US) applies.[50]
 Benin Visa required[51]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination recommended[52]
 Bhutan Visa required[53]
  • US $250 per day is a non-negotiable minimum daily tariff paid by all visitors to Bhutan.
  • Visas are issued only to tourists booked with a local licensed tour operator.[54]
 Bolivia Visa on arrival[55][56] 90 days[57]
  • $135 fee must be paid in cash if applying for visa on arrival[58]
 Bosnia and Herzegovina Visa not required[59][60] 90 days within 180 days
  • Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory.[61]
 Botswana Visa not required[62][63] 90 days per year[64]
 Brazil Visa required[65][66]
 Brunei Visa not required[67][68] 90 days
  • Immigration offenses, such as visa overstaying, are punishable by caning.[69]
 Bulgaria Visa not required[70][71] 90 days within 180 days[72]
 Burkina Faso Visa on arrival[73] 1 month
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[74]
 Burundi Visa on arrival[75] 3 months
  • Visitors are fingerprinted
 Cambodia Visa on arrival[76] 30 days
  • Visa is also obtainable online.[77]
  • All visitors are fingerprinted.[78]
 Cameroon Visa required[79]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination and current immunization records required.[80]
 Canada Visa not required[81][82] 180 days
  • Anyone with a criminal record (including misdemeanors or alcohol-related driving offenses) may not be able to enter Canada without first obtaining an approval for rehabilitation.[83]
 Cape Verde Visa on arrival[84]
  • Obtainable at Nelson Mandela International Airport, Cesária Évora Airport, Amílcar Cabral International Airport and Aristides Pereira International Airport.
  • Passengers arriving via Africa must hold an International Certificate of Vaccination.[85]
 Central African Republic Visa required[86]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[87]
 Chad Visa required[88]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.
  • Registration within 72 hours mandatory.[89]
 Chile Visa not required[90] 90 days[91][92]
 China Visa required[93]
  • Registration mandatory within 24 hours;[94]
  • 72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Guangzhou, Guilin, Shanghai, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Shenyang and Xi'an.
  • Visas for US citizens are valid for 10 years.[95]
 Colombia Visa not required[96][97] 90 days, extendable up to 180 days[98]
 Comoros Visa on arrival[99][100]
 Democratic Republic of the Congo Visa required[101]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.
  • Airport exit fee ($50) must be paid in cash.
  • Registration required.
  • Visas must be issued in Washington, D.C.[102]
 Republic of the Congo Visa required[103]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.
  • A letter of invitation or written proof of a hotel reservation required.[104]
 Costa Rica Visa not required[105] 90 days
  • Departure tax of US $29 applies.[106]
Cote d'Ivoire ! Côte d'Ivoire eVisa[107]
  • eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required[108]
 Croatia Visa not required[109][110] 90 days within 180 days
  • Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory.[111]
 Cuba Visa required !Tourist Card required[112]
  • Under Cuban Assets Control Regulations, all persons subject to U.S. jurisdiction must be licensed in order to engage in any travel-related transactions pursuant to travel to, from, and within Cuba[113]
 Cyprus Visa not required[114][115] 90 days within 180 days[116]
 Czech Republic Visa not required[117][118] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[119]
 Denmark and territories Visa not required[120][121] 90 days within 180 days
  • Citizens of the United States can freely enter and stay in Denmark for up to 90 days every six months, regardless of whether they have stayed in another Schengen area (except the other Nordic countries) country prior to entry into Denmark.[122]
 Djibouti Visa on arrival[123]
  • Obtainable at Djibouti–Ambouli International Airport.[124]
 Dominica Visa not required[125][126] 6 months
  • Departure tax of US$22 applies.[127]
 Dominican Republic Visa on arrival !Tourist Card on arrival[128][129] 30 days, extendable up to 90 days
  • Tourist Card (US$10) must be purchased upon arrival.[130]
 Ecuador Visa not required[131] 90 days, extendable for another 90 days, per year[132]
 Egypt Visa on arrival[133]
  • 30 days when arriving by air;
  • Tourists arriving at Sharm El Sheikh, Saint Catherine or Taba airports and remaining in the Sinai resorts do not require a visa up to 15 days[134]
 El Salvador Visa not required[135][136] 3 months
 Equatorial Guinea Visa not required[137]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[138]
 Eritrea Visa required[139]
  • Airport departure tax (US$20) applies.[140]
 Estonia Visa not required[141][142] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[143]
 Ethiopia Visa on arrival[144]
  • Obtainable at Addis Ababa Bole International Airport.[145]
  • Visitors are fingerprinted
 Fiji Visa on arrival !Visitor's Permit on arrival[146] 4 months[147]
 Finland Visa not required[148][149] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[150]
 France Visa not required[151][152] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area (in Regions of France)[153]
 Gabon e-Visa[154]
  • Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[155]
 Gambia Visa not required[156] 90 days
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[157]
 Georgia Visa not required[158] 360 days[159]
 Germany Visa not required[160] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[161]
 Ghana Visa required[162]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[163]
 Greece Visa not required[164][165] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[166]
 Grenada Visa not required[167][168] 3 months, extensions possible
 Guatemala Visa not required[169] 90 days
  • An exit tax must be paid when departing by air.[170]
 Guinea Visa required[171]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[172]
 Guinea-Bissau Visa on arrival[173] 90 days[174]
 Guyana Visa not required[175] 3 months[176]
 Haiti Visa not required[177][178] 3 months
 Honduras Visa not required[179] 3 months
  • Departing airport tax must be paid in cash.[180]
 Hungary Visa not required[181][182] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[183]
 Iceland Visa not required[184][185] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[186]
 India e-Tourist Visa[187] 30 days
  • $60 fee[188]
  • Confirmation has to be shown at the border where a visa on arrival is issued.
  • e-Tourist Visa can be obtained twice in a calendar year.
  • Visitors are fingerprinted
 Indonesia Visa not required[189][190] 30 days
  • Available at select ports of entry for visa-free. Visa on arrival otherwise.
 Iran Visa required[191]
  • US visitors are fingerprinted upon entry and are ineligible for visa on arrival available to other tourists.[192]
  • A 20-day Iranian tourist visa costs €70 (apx. $110) as of April 2014.[193]
 Iraq Visa required[194]
  • U.S. citizens must obtain an exit stamp at a Residency Office before departing the country.
  • Visitors who plan to stay for more than 10 days must also obtain a residency stamp.[195]
 Ireland Visa not required[196][197] 3 months
  • Strict application of immigration rules regarding providing proof of the trip purpose, sufficient funds, return ticket and accommodation.[198]
 Israel Visa not required[199] 3 months
  • Dual nationals who don't have an Israeli passport, including infants, may be required to obtain an Israeli passport in order to leave the country.[200]
 Italy Visa not required[201][202] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[203]
 Jamaica Visa not required[204]
  • There is a departure tax for travelers, which is regularly included in airfare.[205]
 Japan Visa not required[206] 90 days
  • All visitors are fingerprinted[207]
 Jordan Visa on arrival[208] 30 days; conditions apply[209]
  • Visa on arrival obtainable at most international ports of entry and at most international land border crossings (except King Hussein/Allenby Bridge crossing).[210]
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge in most cases.
  • Iris scan is taken on arrival and departure[211]
 Kazakhstan Visa not required[212][213] 15 days
  • As part of the no-visa pilot program in period 15 July 2014 – 15 July 2015. In June 2015 this program was extended until December 31, 2017.[214][215]
 Kenya eVisa[216] 3 months
  • Also visa on arrival until 1 September 2015.
  • International Certificate of Vaccination is recommended.[217]
  • All visitors are fingerprinted on arrival and departure
 Kiribati Visa not required[218] 30 days
  • Airport Embarkation Tax of AU$20 is levied on all passengers leaving Kiribati.[219]
 North Korea Visa required[220][221]
 South Korea Visa not required[222] 90 days
  • All visitors are fingerprinted.[223]
 Kuwait Visa on arrival[224] 3 months[225]
  • Obtainable at all Kuwaiti ports of entry.[226]
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
 Kyrgyzstan Visa not required[227] 60 days[228]
 Laos Visa on arrival[229] 30 days, conditions apply, extendable up to 60 days[230]
  • Available at international airports Wattay Vientiane, Pakse Savannakhet and Luang Prabang, and at land borders Friendship Bridge, Vientiane and Savannakhet; Nam Heuang Friendship Bridge, Sayabouly Province; and border crossings at Boten-Mohan, Dansavan-Lao Bao, Houaysay-Chiang Khong, Thakhek-Nakhon Phanom, Nong Haet-Nam Kan, Nam Phao-Kao Cheo, Veun Kham-Dong Calor, and Vangtao-Chong Mek as well as Tha Naleng train station in Vientiane, which connects to the train station in Nongkhai, Thailand. Entry points Napao-Chalo, Taichang-Sophoun, Pakxan-Bungkan, and Xiengkok are open only to visa holders.[231]
 Latvia Visa not required[232][233] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[234]
 Lebanon Visa on arrival[235] 1 month
  • Obtainable at the land border with Syria, the port of Beirut, or Beirut International Airport.
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
  • Holders of passports that contain visas or entry/exit stamps for Israel will likely be refused entry into Lebanon and may be subject to arrest and imprisonment.[236]
 Lesotho Visa not required[237] 14 days, extendable up to 180 days[238]
 Liberia Visa required[239]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[240]
 Libya Visa required[241]
  • Visitors travelling to Libya for touristic purposes are required to convert USD 1,000 or equivalent on arrival.
  • Holders of passports bearing an Israeli visa or entry/exit stamps from Israel are not allowed to enter Libya.[242]
 Liechtenstein Visa not required[243] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[244]
 Lithuania Visa not required[245][246] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area
  • Mandatory medical insurance.[247]
 Luxembourg Visa not required[248][249] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[250]
 Macedonia Visa not required[251] 90 days within 180 days
  • Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory[252]
 Madagascar Visa on arrival[253] 30 days
  • Available at all airports servicing international flights.[254]
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge. Visas for 60 or 90 days available for a fee.
 Malawi Visa on arrival[255]
  • From 1 October 2015 visitors are generally advised to obtain a visa in advance.[256]
 Malaysia Visa not required[257] 3 months
  • All visitors are fingerprinted on arrival and departure.[258]
 Maldives Visa on arrival[259] 30 days, extendable up to 90 days
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.[260]
 Mali Visa required[261]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[262]
 Malta Visa not required[263][264] 90 days within 180 days[265]
 Marshall Islands Visa not required[266] unlimited
  • Departure fee of $20 applies.
  • U.S. citizens may live and work freely in the Marshall Islands under the Compact of Free Association.[267]
 Mauritania Visa on arrival[268]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[269]
 Mauritius Visa not required[270] 90 days[271]
 Mexico Visa not required[272][273] 180 days
  • All visitors entering by land and traveling farther than 20 kilometers into Mexico or staying longer than 72 hours should obtain a document Forma Migratoria Multiple.[274][275]
 Micronesia Visa not required[276] unlimited[277]
  • All states except Yap have a departure fee. The fees are $10 for Kosrae and $20 for Pohnpei and Chuuk.[278]
  • U.S. citizens may live and work freely in Micronesia under the Compact of Free Association.
  • There is no limit to the length of time U.S. citizens can remain in the FSM.[279]
 Moldova Visa not required[280] 90 days within 180 days
  • Registration upon arrival is mandatory.[281]
 Monaco Visa not required[282] 90 days within 180 days[283][284]
 Mongolia Visa not required[285] 90 days
  • Registration required after 30 days.[286]
 Montenegro Visa not required[287] 90 days within 180 days
  • Registration with the local police within 24 hours of arrival is mandatory.[288]
 Morocco Visa not required[289] 3 months[290]
 Mozambique Visa required[291][292][293][294]
 Myanmar eVisa[295] 28 days.
  • eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports.
 Namibia Visa not required[296] 3 months[297]
 Nauru Visa required[298] Visas are issued with validity of 30 days.[299]
   Nepal Visa on arrival[300] 90 days
  • Obtainable at Tribhuvan International Airport and certain land borders.
  • Total of no more than 150 aggregate days in any given calendar year.[301]
 Netherlands and territories Visa not required[302][303] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area (European Netherlands)[304]
 New Zealand Visa not required[305] 90 days[306]
 Nicaragua Visa not required[307] 90 days
  • A tourist card must be purchased for $13 upon arrival.[308]
 Niger Visa required[309]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[310]
 Nigeria Visa required[311][312]
 Norway Visa not required[313][314] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[315]
 Oman Visa on arrival[316] 30 days, extendable for 30 days[317]
  • Holders of a visa or entrance stamp of the Emirate of Dubai that is valid for at least 21 days are visa exempt.
  • Holders of a visa for Qatar that is valid for travel to Oman and valid for at least one month are visa exempt when arriving directly from Qatar.
  • Iris scan is taken on arrival[211]
 Pakistan Visa required[318][319]
  • Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days if a local sponsor obtained an approval from the immigration authorities at the port of arrival (Islamabad, Lahore, Peshawar, Quetta or Karachi airports) and provided holding a recommendation letter from country of residence or invitation letter from Pakistan.[320]
  • Visa on arrival when travelling as part of a group through a designated tour operator.[321]
 Palau Visa not required[322] 1 year[323]
  • U.S. citizens may live and work freely in Palau under the Compact of Free Association.
 Panama Visa not required[324] 180 days
  • Denial of entry or transit to any person who has a criminal conviction.[325]
 Papua New Guinea Visa on arrival[326] 60 days, extendable for 30 days[327]
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
 Paraguay Visa on arrival[328] 90 days
  • Available at Silvio Pettirossi International Airport only.[329]
 Peru Visa not required[330] up to 183 days; determined on arrival[331]
 Philippines Visa not required[332][333] 30 days
  • Visa on arrival valid for 59 days is available for $50.
 Poland Visa not required[334] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area
  • Polish Americans must use Polish passport[335]
 Portugal Visa not required[336][337][338] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[339]
 Qatar Visa on arrival[340] 1 month
  • Available only at Doha International Airport, for other ports of entry a visa should be obtained either online or in advance.[341]
  • Holders of a valid common visa issued by Oman are exempt from a visa if arriving from Oman directly.
 Romania Visa not required[342][343] 90 days within 180 days[344]
 Russia Visa required[345]
  • 72-hour visa-free for international cruise ship/ferry passengers only if travelling with an organized tour and accompanied at all times by a tour operator.
  • Registration required after 7 business days.[346][347]
 Rwanda Visa on arrival[348][349] 30 days
  • Visitors are fingerprinted
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[350]
 Saint Kitts and Nevis Visa not required[351][352] 3 months
 Saint Lucia Visa not required[353][354] 6 weeks
 Saint Vincent and the Grenadines Visa not required[355] 1 month[356]
 Samoa Visa on arrival !Entry Permit on arrival[357] 60 days
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
  • Departure tax of $30.00 USD applies.[358]
 San Marino Visa not required[359][360]
 São Tomé and Príncipe Visa not required[361] 15 days
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[362]
 Saudi Arabia Visa required[363]
  • No tourist visas available.[364]
  • All visitors are fingerprinted[365]
 Senegal Visa not required[366] 90 days
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[367]
 Serbia Visa not required[368] 90 days within 180 days[369]
 Seychelles Visa on arrival !Visitor's Permit on arrival[370] 3 months, extendable up to a year[371]
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
 Sierra Leone Visa required[372]
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[373]
 Singapore Visa not required[374] 90 days[375]
 Slovakia Visa not required[376][377] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area
  • Medical insurance required.
  • Sufficient funds of $50 per person per day required.
  • Registration within 3 working days required.[378]
 Slovenia Visa not required[379][380] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area
  • Registration with the local police within 72 hours of arrival is mandatory.[381]
 Solomon Islands Visa on arrival !Visitor's permit on arrival[382] 3 months within 12 months[383]
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
 Somalia Visa on arrival[384][385] 30 days
  • Provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.
 South Africa Visa not required[386] 90 days
  • Holders of passports without 2 blank pages may be refused entry.[387]
 South Sudan Visa required[388]
  • Two blank passport pages required.[389]
 Spain Visa not required[390][391] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[392]
 Sri Lanka Electronic Travel Authorization[393] 30 days[394]
 Sudan Visa required[395]
  • Holders of passports that contain visas or entry/exit stamps for Israel will likely be refused entry.
  • Exit visa required.
  • Registration within 3 days mandatory.[396]
 Suriname Visa on arrival !Tourist Card on arrival[397] 90 days
  • Obtainable at Johan Adolf Pengel International Airport.[398]
 Swaziland Visa not required[399] 30 days, extendable up to 60 days[400]
 Sweden Visa not required[401][402] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[403]
  Switzerland Visa not required[404][405] 90 days within 180 days in the Schengen area[406]
 Syria Visa required[407]
  • Registration required within 15 days.
  • Departure tax applies at all borders.
  • Persons with passports bearing Israeli visas or entry/exit stamps are not allowed to enter.[408]
 Tajikistan Visa on arrival[409][410] 45 days
  • Visa on arrival available only at Dushanbe International Airport.
  • If arriving from a country that has a Tajik diplomatic mission a visa should be obtained in advance.
 Tanzania Visa on arrival[411][412]
 Thailand Visa not required[413] 30 days, extendable once[414]
 Timor-Leste Visa on arrival[415] 30 days for arrivals by air only[416]
 Togo Visa on arrival[417] 7 days[418]
 Tonga Visa on arrival[419] 31 days[420]
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
 Trinidad and Tobago Visa not required[421] 90 days[422]
 Tunisia Visa not required[423] 4 months[424]
 Turkey eVisa[425] 3 months[426]
 Turkmenistan Visa required[427]
  • Departure fee of $25 applies.[428]
  • 10 day visa on arrival if holding letter of invitation issued by a company registered in Turkmenistan with a prior approval from the Foreign Ministry.[429]
 Tuvalu Visa on arrival[430] 1 month, extendable up to 3 months[431]
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.
 Uganda Visa on arrival[432] Determined at the port of entry
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[433]
 Ukraine Visa not required[434] 90 days within 180 days[435]
 United Arab Emirates Visa on arrival[436] 30 days
  • Visa on arrival is issued free of charge.[437]
  • Iris scan taken on arrival
 United Kingdom
excluding some Overseas territories		 Visa not required[438][439] 6 months[440]
 Uruguay Visa not required[441] 3 months[442]
 Uzbekistan Visa required[443]
  • Registration within 3 days mandatory.[444]
 Vanuatu Visa not required[445] 30 days, extendable up to 120 days[446]
  Vatican City Visa not required[447]
 Venezuela Visa required[448]
 Vietnam Visa required[449][450]
  • Pre-arranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City or Da Nang airports.
  • Phú Quốc visa exemption for up to 30 days.[451][452]
 Yemen Visa required[453]
  • Registration mandatory.
  • Exit visa required for stays over 30 days.[454]
 Zambia Visa on arrival[455] 90 days (exact period determined on arrival, later extendable free of charge)
  • All visitors are fingerprinted.
  • Two blank pages required
  • International Certificate of Vaccination required.[456]
  • Electronic visa also available.[457]
  • US citizens are also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe.
 Zimbabwe Visa on arrival[458] 3 months
  • Tourism purposes only.[459]
  • Electronic visa also available.[460]
  • US citizens are also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia.

Dependent, Disputed, or Restricted territories[edit]

Visa requirements for United States citizens for visits to various territories, disputed areas, partially recognized countries, and restricted zones:

Europe
Visitor to Visa requirement Allowed stay Notes (excluding departure fees)
 Abkhazia Visa required[461]
Mount Athos Special permit required Special permit required (4 days: 25 euro for Orthodox visitors, 35 euro for non-Orthodox visitors, 18 euro for students). There is a visitors' quota: maximum 100 Orthodox and 10 non-Orthodox per day and women are not allowed.[462][463]
Belovezhskaya Pushcha National Park Visa not required 3 days[464] Visitors must first obtain an electronic pass.[465]
Crimea Visa required Visa issued by Russia is required.[466]
 Donetsk People's Republic Restricted area Crossing from Ukraine requires visit purpose to be explained to Ukrainian passport control on exit and those who entered from Russia are not allowed to proceed further into Ukraine.[467][468]
 Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus Visa not required 3 months[469][470]
UN Buffer Zone in Cyprus Access Permit required[471] Access Permit is required for travelling inside the zone, except Civil Use Areas.
 Faroe Islands Visa not required[472]
 Gibraltar Visa not required[473]
 Guernsey Visa not required[474]
 Isle of Man Visa not required[475]
Jan Mayen Permit required[473] 24 hours Permit issued by the local police required for staying for less than 24 hours[476] and permit issued by the Norwegian police for staying for more than 24 hours.[477]
 Jersey Visa not required[478]
 Kosovo Visa not required 90 days[479]
 Lugansk People's Republic Restricted area Crossing from Ukraine requires visit purpose to be explained to Ukrainian passport control on exit and those who entered from Russia are not allowed to proceed further into Ukraine.[467][468]
 Nagorno-Karabakh Republic Visa required[480][481] Travellers with Nagorno-Karabakh visa (expired or valid) or evidence of travel to Nagorno-Karabakh (stamps) will be permanently denied entry to Azerbaijan.[482]
Closed cities of Russia Special authorization required Several closed cities and regions in Russia require special authorization.[347]
 South Ossetia Visa not required Multiple entry visa to Russia and three day prior notification are required to enter South Ossetia.[483][484]
 Svalbard Visa not required[485] Unlimited (Svalbard Treaty)
 Transnistria Visa not required 24 hours Registration required after 24h.[486][487]
Africa
Visitor to Visa requirement Allowed stay Notes (excluding departure fees)
 British Indian Ocean Territory Special permit required Special permit required.[488]
 Eritrea outside Asmara Travel permit required To travel in the rest of the country, a Travel Permit for Foreigners is required (20 Eritrean nakfa).[489]
 Ascension Island Entry Permit required Entry Permit must be obtained minimum 28 days in advance (3 months for 20/30 pounds sterling, single/double entry).[490]
 Saint Helena Visitor's Pass required Visitor's Pass granted on arrival valid for 4/10/21/60/90 days for 12/14/16/20/25 pound sterling.[491]
 Tristan da Cunha Permission required Permission to land required for 15/30 pounds sterling (yacht/ship passenger) for Tristan da Cunha Island or 20 pounds sterling for Gough Island, Inaccessible Island or Nightingale Islands.[492]
 Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic Undefined visa regime in the Western Sahara controlled territory.
 Somaliland Visa on arrival 30 days 30 US dollars, payable on arrival.[493][494]
 Sudan outside Khartoum Travel permit required All foreigners traveling more than 25 kilometers outside of Khartoum must obtain a travel permit.
Darfur Travel permit required Separate travel permit is required.[389]
Asia
Visitor to Visa requirement Allowed stay Notes (excluding departure fees)
Hainan Visa not required 15 days[495]
 Hong Kong Visa not required 3 months[496]
 India PAP/RAP PAP/RAP required Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for whole states of Nagaland and Sikkim and parts of states Manipur, Arunachal Pradesh, Uttaranchal, Jammu and Kashmir, Rajasthan, Himachal Pradesh. Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and parts of Sikkim. Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year.[497][498][499][500][501][502]
 Iraqi Kurdistan Visa on arrival Visa on arrival for 15 days is available at Erbil and Sulaymaniyah airports.[194]
Baikonur & Gvardeyskiy Special permission required Special permission required for the town of Baikonur and surrounding areas in Kyzylorda Oblast, and the town of Gvardeyskiy near Almaty.[503]
Kish Island Visa not required Visitors to Kish Island do not require a visa.[192]
 Macao Visa not required 30 days[504]
Sabah and Sarawak Visa not required These states have their own immigration authorities and passport is required to travel to them, however the same visa applies.[505]
 Maldives Permission required With the exception of the capital Malé, tourists are generally prohibited from visiting non-resort islands without the express permission of the Government of Maldives.[506]
City of Mecca Special access required Non-Muslims and those following the Ahmadiyya religious movement are prohibited from entry.
 Palestine Visa not required Arrival by sea to Gaza Strip not allowed.[507]
 Taiwan Visa not required 90 days[508]
Gorno-Badakhshan Autonomous Province OIVR permit required OIVR permit required (15+5 Tajikistani Somoni) and another special permit (free of charge) is required for Lake Sarez.[509][510][511]
Tibet Autonomous Region TTP required Tibet Travel Permit required (10 US Dollars).[512][513][514]
Closed cities of Turkmenistan Special permit required A special permit, issued prior to arrival by Ministry of Foreign Affairs, is required if visiting the following places: Atamurat, Cheleken, Dashoguz, Serakhs and Serhetabat.[515]
Korean Demilitarized Zone Restricted zone.
UNDOF Zone and Ghajar Restricted zone.
Phú Quốc Visa not required 30 days[516]
 Yemen outside Sana’a or Aden Special permission required Special permission needed for travel outside Sana’a or Aden.[454]
Continental United States and Canada
Visitor to Visa requirement Allowed stay Notes (excluding departure fees)
Closed city of Mercury, Nevada, United States Special permission required Special authorization is required for entry into Mercury.
Caribbean and North Atlantic
Visitor to Visa requirement Allowed stay Notes (excluding departure fees)
 Anguilla Visa not required 3 months[517]
 Aruba Visa not required 30 days, extendable to 180 days[518][519]
 Bermuda Visa not required Up to 6 months, decided on arrival.[520]
Bonaire, St. Eustatius and Saba Visa not required 3 months[521][522]
 British Virgin Islands Visa not required 30 days, extensions possible[523]
 Cayman Islands Visa not required 6 months[524]
San Andrés and Leticia Tourist Card on arrival Visitors arriving at Gustavo Rojas Pinilla International Airport and Alfredo Vásquez Cobo International Airport must buy tourist cards on arrival.[525]
 Curacao Visa not required 3 months[526]
French Guiana Visa not required 3 months[527]
French West Indies Visa not required 3 months (French West Indies refers to Martinique, Guadeloupe, Saint Martin and Saint Barthélemy)[528]
 Greenland Visa not required[472]
Margarita Island Visa required[529] All visitors are fingerprinted.[530]
 Montserrat Visa not required 6 months
Puerto Rico Visa not required Unlimited
  • U.S. citizens and American Samoan citizens may live and work freely in Puerto Rico[531][532]
  • No Passport is required, but a driver's permit/license is required for entry if flying.
 Sint Maarten Visa not required 3 months[533][534]
 Turks and Caicos Islands Visa not required 90 days[535]
U.S. Virgin Islands Visa not required Unlimited
  • U.S. citizens and American Samoan citizens may live and work freely in the U.S. Virgin Islands[536]
  • No Passport is required, but it may be necessary when departing and re-entering.
Oceania
Visitor to Visa requirement Allowed stay Notes (excluding departure fees)
American Samoa Visa not required Unlimited
  • must have a valid six month passport, a return ticket, or an onward ticket, for entry
  • U.S. citizens may live and work freely in American Samoa.[537]
Ashmore and Cartier Islands Special authorisation required Special authorisation required.[538]
Clipperton Island Special permit required Special permit required.[539]
 Cook Islands Visa not required 31 days[540]
Lau Province Special permission required Special permission required.[147]
 French Polynesia Visa not required 90 days within 180 days[541]
Guam Visa not required Unlimited U.S. citizens and American Samoan citizens may live and work freely in Guam. Proof of citizenship is required for entry.[542][543]
 Niue Visa on arrival 30 days[544]
Northern Mariana Islands Visa not required Unlimited U.S. citizens and American Samoan citizens may live and work freely in the Northern Mariana Islands. Proof of citizenship is required for entry.[545]
 Pitcairn Islands Visa not required 14 days visa free and landing fee 35 USD or tax of 5 USD if not going ashore.[546][547][548]
United States Minor Outlying Islands Special permits required Special permits required for Baker Island, Howland Island, Jarvis Island, Johnston Atoll, Kingman Reef, Midway Atoll, Palmyra Atoll and Wake Island.[549][550][551][552][553][554][555]
South America
Visitor to Visa requirement Allowed stay Notes (excluding departure fees)
Galápagos Pre-registration required Online pre-registration is required. Transit Control Card must also be obtained at the airport prior to departure.[556]
South Atlantic and Antarctica
Visitor to Visa requirement Allowed stay Notes (excluding departure fees)
 Falkland Islands Visa not required Visa is not required.[557]
 South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands Permit required Pre-arrival permit from the Commissioner required (72 hours/1 month for 110/160 pounds sterling).[558][559]
Antarctica Special permits required for  British Antarctic Territory,  French Southern and Antarctic Lands,  Argentine Antarctica, Australian Antarctic Territory, Chilean Antarctic Territory, Heard Island and McDonald Islands, Peter I Island, Queen Maud Land, Ross Dependency.[560][561][562][563][564][565][566][567][568][569][570][571]
